entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
